meanings.definition: A soft, absorbent paper used for cleaning oneself after using the toilet.
meanings.sent1: I ran out of bumwads in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to restock the bumwads in the restroom.
meanings.sent3: John accidentally used the last bumwad and had to ask for more.
meanings.sent4: The bumwads in the dispenser felt like clouds against my skin.
meanings.sent5: The fluffy bumwads were a welcome sight in the bathroom.

meanings.definition: A derogatory term for a useless or lazy person.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a bumwad and help with the chores.
meanings.sent2: He always sits around like a bumwad, never doing anything productive.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked at the lazy dog and thought, 'What a bumwad.'
meanings.sent4: Her brother was a bumwad, always relying on others to do things for him.
meanings.sent5: The bumwad at work never lifts a finger to help anyone.
